    Wailing Joe Siren

    On this page

    Cleaning up some old stuff and found this from the 70’s.

    It’s a quarter mile siren (you can hear it from that far away). It was part of the burglar alarm system my dad made and why I got interested in electronics. The relay was protected from the elements by an upside-down glass jar attached to the lid.

    Tags: electronics

    Categories: academia

    Updated: May 31, 2020
